InternalFunction.Name: begin
InternalFunction.Description: returns the last expression in a sequence after evaluating the sequence in order.

InternalFunction.Name: if
InternalFunction.Description: returns one of two values based on the value of a condition.

InternalFunction.Name: set
InternalFunction.Description: set the value of a global variable.

InternalFunction.Name: and
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if all specified expressions are true.

InternalFunction.Name: or
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any specified expressions are true.

InternalFunction.Name: not
InternalFunction.Description: returns the opposite of the expression.

InternalFunction.Name: begin_random
InternalFunction.Description: evaluates the sequence of expressions in random order and returns the last value evaluated.

InternalFunction.Name: cond
InternalFunction.Description: returns the value associated with the first true condition.

InternalFunction.Name: min
InternalFunction.Description: returns the minimum of all specified expressions.

InternalFunction.Name: max
InternalFunction.Description: returns the maximum of all specified expressions.

InternalFunction.Name: sleep
InternalFunction.Description: pauses execution of this script (or, optionally, another script) for the specified number of ticks.

InternalFunction.Name: wake
InternalFunction.Description: wakes a sleeping script in the next update.

InternalFunction.Name: inspect
InternalFunction.Description: prints the value of an expression to the screen for debugging purposes.

InternalFunction.Name: unit
InternalFunction.Description: converts an object to a unit.

InternalFunction.Name: print
InternalFunction.Description: prints a string to the console.

InternalFunction.Name: players
InternalFunction.Description: returns a list of the players

InternalFunction.Name: list_get
InternalFunction.Description: returns an item in an object list.

InternalFunction.Name: list_count
InternalFunction.Description: returns the number of objects in a list

InternalFunction.Name: damage_new
InternalFunction.Description: causes the specified damage at the specified flag.

InternalFunction.Name: damage_object
InternalFunction.Description: causes the specified damage at the specified object.

InternalFunction.Name: script_recompile
InternalFunction.Description: recompiles scripts.

InternalFunction.Name: script_doc
InternalFunction.Description: saves a file called hs_doc.txt with parameters for all script commands.

InternalFunction.Name: help
InternalFunction.Description: prints a description of the named function.

InternalFunction.Name: random_range
InternalFunction.Description: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

InternalFunction.Name: real_random_range
InternalFunction.Description: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

InternalFunction.Name: breakable_surfaces_enable
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables breakability of all breakable surfaces on level

InternalFunction.Name: garbage_collect_now
InternalFunction.Description: causes all garbage objects except those visible to a player to be collected immediately

InternalFunction.Name: custom_animation
InternalFunction.Description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

InternalFunction.Name: custom_animation_list
InternalFunction.Description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit list (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

InternalFunction.Name: magic_seat_name
InternalFunction.Description: all units controlled by the player will assume the given seat name (valid values are 'asleep', 'alert', 'stand', 'crouch' and 'flee')

InternalFunction.Name: magic_melee_attack
InternalFunction.Description: causes player's unit to start a melee attack

InternalFunction.Name: breakable_surfaces_reset
InternalFunction.Description: restores all breakable surfaces

InternalFunction.Name: map_reset
InternalFunction.Description: starts the map from the beginning.

InternalFunction.Name: map_name
InternalFunction.Description: changes the name of the solo player map.

InternalFunction.Name: multiplayer_map_name
InternalFunction.Description: changes the name of the multiplayer map

InternalFunction.Name: crash
InternalFunction.Description: crashes (for debugging).

InternalFunction.Name: switch_bsp
InternalFunction.Description: takes off your condom and changes to a different structure bsp

InternalFunction.Name: version
InternalFunction.Description: prints the build version.

InternalFunction.Name: playback
InternalFunction.Description: starts game in film playback mode

InternalFunction.Name: quit
InternalFunction.Description: quits the game

InternalFunction.Name: debug_memory
InternalFunction.Description: dumps memory leaks.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_tags
InternalFunction.Description: writes all memory being used by tag files into tag_dump.txt

InternalFunction.Name: debug_pvs
InternalFunction.Description: displays the current pvs.

InternalFunction.Name: radiosity_start
InternalFunction.Description: starts radiosity computation.

InternalFunction.Name: radiosity_save
InternalFunction.Description: saves radiosity solution.

InternalFunction.Name: radiosity_debug_point
InternalFunction.Description: tests sun occlusion at a point.

InternalFunction.Name: ai
InternalFunction.Description: turns all AI on or off.

InternalFunction.Name: show_hud
InternalFunction.Description: shows or hides the hud

InternalFunction.Name: enable_hud_help_flash
InternalFunction.Description: starts/stops the help text flashing

InternalFunction.Name: cls
InternalFunction.Description: clears console text from the screen

InternalFunction.Name: connect
InternalFunction.Description: Attempt to connect to server - use ip:port password as parameters

InternalFunction.Name: disconnect
InternalFunction.Description: Disconnect from a server

InternalFunction.Name: play_update_history
InternalFunction.Description: Playback client input history starting from the specified last completed update id.

InternalFunction.Name: error_overflow_suppression
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables the suppression of error spamming

InternalFunction.Name: pause_hud_timer
InternalFunction.Description: pauses or unpauses the hud timer

InternalFunction.Name: script_screen_effect_set_value
InternalFunction.Description: sets a screen effect script value

InternalFunction.Name: delete_save_game_files
InternalFunction.Description: delete all custom profile files

InternalFunction.Name: fast_setup_network_server
InternalFunction.Description: sets up a network server with the given map name, game variant, and true for remote connections, false for not

InternalFunction.Name: ui_widget_show_path
InternalFunction.Description: blah blah

InternalFunction.Name: display_scenario_help
InternalFunction.Description: display in-game help dialog

InternalFunction.Name: config_one_control
InternalFunction.Description: test function to configure a single control

InternalFunction.Name: get_yaw_rate
InternalFunction.Description: gets the yaw rate for the given player number

InternalFunction.Name: get_pitch_rate
InternalFunction.Description: gets the yaw rate for the given player number

InternalFunction.Name: set_yaw_rate
InternalFunction.Description: sets the yaw rate for the given player number

InternalFunction.Name: set_pitch_rate
InternalFunction.Description: sets the yaw rate for the given player number

InternalFunction.Name: bind
InternalFunction.Description: binds an input device/button combination to a game control

InternalFunction.Name: unbind
InternalFunction.Description: unbinds an input device/button combination

InternalFunction.Name: print_binds
InternalFunction.Description: prints a list of all input bindings

InternalFunction.Name: change_team
InternalFunction.Description: change your team (0=red,1=blue,else=auto

InternalFunction.Name: rcon
InternalFunction.Description: Sends a command for server to execute at console. Use \" to send quotes.

InternalFunction.Name: track_remote_player_position_updates
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the name of the remote player whose position update are to be tracked.

InternalFunction.Name: remote_player_stats
InternalFunction.Description: Displays the prediction stats of the specified remote player.

InternalFunction.Name: sleep_until
InternalFunction.Description: pauses execution of this script until the specified condition is true, checking once per second unless a different number of ticks is specified.

InternalFunction.Name: thread_sleep
InternalFunction.Description: Sleeps the calling thread for the specified number of ms.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_communication_suppress
InternalFunction.Description: suppresses (or stops suppressing) a set of AI communication types.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_communication_ignore
InternalFunction.Description: ignores (or stops ignoring) a set of AI communication types when printing out communications.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_communication_focus
InternalFunction.Description: focuses (or stops focusing) a set of unit vocalization types.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_sound_point_set
InternalFunction.Description: drops the AI debugging sound point at the camera location

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_vocalize
InternalFunction.Description: makes the selected AI vocalize

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_teleport_to
InternalFunction.Description: teleports all players to the specified encounter

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_speak
InternalFunction.Description: makes the currently selected AI speak a vocalization (e.g. ai_speak "pain minor")

InternalFunction.Name: ai_debug_speak_list
InternalFunction.Description: makes the currently selected AI speak a list of vocalizations (e.g. ai_speak_list "involuntary")

InternalFunction.Name: ai_magically_see_encounter
InternalFunction.Description: makes one encounter magically aware of another.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_magically_see_players
InternalFunction.Description: makes an encounter magically aware of nearby players.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_magically_see_unit
InternalFunction.Description: makes an encounter magically aware of the specified unit.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_command_list_by_unit
InternalFunction.Description: tells a named unit to begin executing the specified command list

InternalFunction.Name: ai_command_list_advance
InternalFunction.Description: tells a group of actors that are running a command list that they may advance further along the list (if they are waiting for a stimulus)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_command_list_advance_by_unit
InternalFunction.Description: just like ai_command_list_advance but operates upon a unit instead

InternalFunction.Name: ai_command_list_status
InternalFunction.Description: gets the status of a number of units running command lists: 0 = none, 1 = finished command list, 2 = waiting for stimulus, 3 = running command list

InternalFunction.Name: ai_vehicle_encounter
InternalFunction.Description: sets a vehicle to 'belong' to a particular encounter/squad. any actors who get into the vehicle will be placed in this squad. NB: vehicles potentially drivable by multiple teams need their own encounter!

InternalFunction.Name: ai_vehicle_enterable_distance
InternalFunction.Description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors within a certain distance

InternalFunction.Name: ai_vehicle_enterable_team
InternalFunction.Description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors on a certain team

InternalFunction.Name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actor_type
InternalFunction.Description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors of a certain type (grunt, elite, marine etc)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actors
InternalFunction.Description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for a certain encounter/squad of actors

InternalFunction.Name: ai_vehicle_enterable_disable
InternalFunction.Description: disables actors from impulsively getting into a vehicle (this is the default state for newly placed vehicles)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_conversation_stop
InternalFunction.Description: stops a conversation from playing or trying to play

InternalFunction.Name: ai_conversation_advance
InternalFunction.Description: tells a conversation that it may advance

InternalFunction.Name: ai_conversation_line
InternalFunction.Description: returns which line the conversation is currently playing, or 999 if the conversation is not currently playing

InternalFunction.Name: ai_conversation_status
InternalFunction.Description: returns the status of a conversation (0=none, 1=trying to begin, 2=waiting for guys to get in position, 3=playing, 4=waiting to advance, 5=could not begin, 6=finished successfully, 7=aborted midway

InternalFunction.Name: ai_free
InternalFunction.Description: removes a group of actors from their encounter and sets them free

InternalFunction.Name: ai_free_units
InternalFunction.Description: removes a set of units from their encounter (if any) and sets them free

InternalFunction.Name: ai_attach
InternalFunction.Description: attaches the specified unit to the specified encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_attach_free
InternalFunction.Description: attaches a unit to a newly created free actor of the specified type

InternalFunction.Name: ai_detach
InternalFunction.Description: detaches the specified unit from all AI.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_place
InternalFunction.Description: places the specified encounter on the map.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_kill
InternalFunction.Description: instantly kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_kill_silent
InternalFunction.Description: instantly and silently (no animation or sound played) kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_erase
InternalFunction.Description: erases the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_erase_all
InternalFunction.Description: erases all AI.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_select
InternalFunction.Description: selects the specified encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_deselect
InternalFunction.Description: clears the selected encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_spawn_actor
InternalFunction.Description: spawns a single actor in the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_set_respawn
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables respawning in the specified encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_set_deaf
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables hearing for actors in the specified encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_set_blind
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables sight for actors in the specified encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_timer_start
InternalFunction.Description: makes a squad's delay timer start counting.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_timer_expire
InternalFunction.Description: makes a squad's delay timer expire and releases them to enter combat.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_attack
InternalFunction.Description: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the attacking state.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_defend
InternalFunction.Description: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the defending state.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_retreat
InternalFunction.Description: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_maneuver
InternalFunction.Description: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_maneuver_enable
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables the maneuver/retreat rule for an encounter or platoon. the rule will still trigger, but none of the actors will be given the order to change squads.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_migrate
InternalFunction.Description: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_migrate_and_speak
InternalFunction.Description: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter, and say their 'advance' or 'retreat' speech lines.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_migrate_by_unit
InternalFunction.Description: makes a named vehicle or group of units move to another encounter.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_allegiance
InternalFunction.Description: creates an allegiance between two teams.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_allegiance_remove
InternalFunction.Description: destroys an allegiance between two teams.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_living_count
InternalFunction.Description: return the number of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_living_fraction
InternalFunction.Description: return the fraction [0-1] of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_strength
InternalFunction.Description: return the current strength (average body vitality from 0-1) of the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_swarm_count
InternalFunction.Description: return the number of swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_nonswarm_count
InternalFunction.Description: return the number of non-swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_actors
InternalFunction.Description: converts an ai reference to an object list.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_go_to_vehicle
InternalFunction.Description: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... does not interrupt any actors who are already going to vehicles

InternalFunction.Name: ai_go_to_vehicle_override
InternalFunction.Description: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... NB: any actors who are already going to vehicles will stop and go to this one instead!

InternalFunction.Name: ai_going_to_vehicle
InternalFunction.Description: return the number of actors that are still trying to get into the specified vehicle

InternalFunction.Name: ai_exit_vehicle
InternalFunction.Description: tells a group of actors to get out of any vehicles that they are in

InternalFunction.Name: ai_braindead
InternalFunction.Description: makes a group of actors braindead, or restores them to life (in their initial state)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_braindead_by_unit
InternalFunction.Description: makes a list of objects braindead, or restores them to life. if you pass in a vehicle index, it makes all actors in that vehicle braindead (including any built-in guns)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_disregard
InternalFunction.Description: if TRUE, forces all actors to completely disregard the specified units, otherwise lets them acknowledge the units again

InternalFunction.Name: ai_prefer_target
InternalFunction.Description: if TRUE, *ALL* enemies will prefer to attack the specified units. if FALSE, removes the preference.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location
InternalFunction.Description: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location_if_unsupported
InternalFunction.Description: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s), only if they are not supported by solid ground (i.e. if they are falling after switching BSPs)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_renew
InternalFunction.Description: refreshes the health and grenade count of a group of actors, so they are as good as new

InternalFunction.Name: ai_try_to_fight_nothing
InternalFunction.Description: removes the preferential target setting from a group of actors

InternalFunction.Name: ai_try_to_fight
InternalFunction.Description: causes a group of actors to preferentially target another group of actors

InternalFunction.Name: ai_try_to_fight_player
InternalFunction.Description: causes a group of actors to preferentially target the player

InternalFunction.Name: ai_command_list
InternalFunction.Description: tells a group of actors to begin executing the specified command list

InternalFunction.Name: ai_is_attacking
InternalFunction.Description: returns whether a platoon is in the attacking mode (or if an encounter is specified, returns whether any platoon in that encounter is attacking)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_force_active
InternalFunction.Description: forces an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

InternalFunction.Name: ai_force_active_by_unit
InternalFunction.Description: forces a named actor that is NOT in an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

InternalFunction.Name: ai_set_return_state
InternalFunction.Description: sets the state that a group of actors will return to when they have nothing to do

InternalFunction.Name: ai_set_current_state
InternalFunction.Description: sets the current state of a group of actors. WARNING: may have unpredictable results on actors that are in combat

InternalFunction.Name: ai_playfight
InternalFunction.Description: sets an encounter to be playfighting or not

InternalFunction.Name: ai_status
InternalFunction.Description: returns the most severe combat status of a group of actors (0=inactive, 1=noncombat, 2=guarding, 3=search/suspicious, 4=definite enemy(heard or magic awareness), 5=visible enemy, 6=engaging in combat.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_reconnect
InternalFunction.Description: reconnects all AI information to the current structure bsp (use this after you create encounters or command lists in sapien, or place new firing points or command list points)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_look_at_object
InternalFunction.Description: tells an actor to look at an object until further notice

InternalFunction.Name: ai_stop_looking
InternalFunction.Description: tells an actor to stop looking at whatever it's looking at

InternalFunction.Name: ai_automatic_migration_target
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables a squad as being an automatic migration target

InternalFunction.Name: ai_follow_target_disable
InternalFunction.Description: turns off following for an encounter

InternalFunction.Name: ai_follow_target_players
InternalFunction.Description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be the closest player

InternalFunction.Name: ai_follow_target_unit
InternalFunction.Description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a specific unit

InternalFunction.Name: ai_follow_target_ai
InternalFunction.Description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a group of AI (encounter, squad or platoon)

InternalFunction.Name: ai_follow_distance
InternalFunction.Description: sets the distance threshold which will cause squads to migrate when following someone

InternalFunction.Name: ai_conversation
InternalFunction.Description: tries to add an entry to the list of conversations waiting to play. returns FALSE if the required units could not be found to play the conversation, or if the player is too far away and the 'delay' flag is not set.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_link_activation
InternalFunction.Description: links the first encounter so that it will be made active whenever it detects that the second encounter is active

InternalFunction.Name: ai_berserk
InternalFunction.Description: forces a group of actors to start or stop berserking

InternalFunction.Name: ai_set_team
InternalFunction.Description: makes an encounter change to a new team

InternalFunction.Name: ai_allow_charge
InternalFunction.Description: either enables or disables charging behavior for a group of actors

InternalFunction.Name: ai_allow_dormant
InternalFunction.Description: either enables or disables automatic dormancy for a group of actors

InternalFunction.Name: ai_allegiance_broken
InternalFunction.Description: returns whether two teams have an allegiance that is currently broken by traitorous behavior

InternalFunction.Name: ai_dialogue_triggers
InternalFunction.Description: turns impromptu dialogue on or off.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_grenades
InternalFunction.Description: turns grenade inventory on or off.

InternalFunction.Name: ai_lines
InternalFunction.Description: cycles through AI line-spray modes

InternalFunction.Name: volume_test_object
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if the specified object is within the specified volume.

InternalFunction.Name: volume_test_objects
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

InternalFunction.Name: volume_test_objects_all
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

InternalFunction.Name: volume_teleport_players_not_inside
InternalFunction.Description: moves all players outside a specified trigger volume to a specified flag.

InternalFunction.Name: structure_bsp_index
InternalFunction.Description: returns the current structure bsp index

InternalFunction.Name: structure_lens_flares_place
InternalFunction.Description: places lens flares in the structure bsp

InternalFunction.Name: object_create_anew
InternalFunction.Description: creates an object, destroying it first if it already exists.

InternalFunction.Name: object_create_containing
InternalFunction.Description: creates all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

InternalFunction.Name: object_create_anew_containing
InternalFunction.Description: creates anew all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

InternalFunction.Name: object_destroy_containing
InternalFunction.Description: destroys all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

InternalFunction.Name: object_destroy_all
InternalFunction.Description: destroys all non player objects.

InternalFunction.Name: object_pvs_activate
InternalFunction.Description: just another (old) name for object_pvs_set_object.

InternalFunction.Name: object_pvs_clear
InternalFunction.Description: removes the special place that activates everything it sees.

Global.Name: Object
Global.Description: sets the specified object as the special place that activates everything it sees.

Global.Name: Camera
Global.Description: sets the specified cutscene camera point as the special place that activates everything it sees.

InternalFunction.Name: object_teleport
InternalFunction.Description: moves the specified object to the specified flag.

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_facing
InternalFunction.Description: turns the specified object in the direction of the specified flag.

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_shield
InternalFunction.Description: sets the shield vitality of the specified object (between 0 and 1).

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_permutation
InternalFunction.Description: sets the desired region (use "" for all regions) to the permutation with the given name, e.g. (object_set_permutation flood "right arm" ~damaged)

InternalFunction.Name: object_create
InternalFunction.Description: creates an object from the scenario.

InternalFunction.Name: object_destroy
InternalFunction.Description: destroys an object.

InternalFunction.Name: objects_can_see_object
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the object.

InternalFunction.Name: objects_can_see_flag
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the flag.

InternalFunction.Name: objects_delete_by_definition
InternalFunction.Description: deletes all objects of type <definition>

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_ranged_attack_inhibited
InternalFunction.Description: FALSE prevents object from using ranged attack

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_melee_attack_inhibited
InternalFunction.Description: FALSE prevents object from using melee attack

InternalFunction.Name: objects_dump_memory
InternalFunction.Description: debugs object memory usage

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_collideable
InternalFunction.Description: FALSE prevents any object from colliding with the given object

InternalFunction.Name: object_set_scale
InternalFunction.Description: sets the scale for a given object and interpolates over the given number of frames to achieve that scale

InternalFunction.Name: objects_attach
InternalFunction.Description: attaches the second object to the first; both strings can be empty

InternalFunction.Name: objects_detach
InternalFunction.Description: detaches from the given parent object the given child object

InternalFunction.Name: object_cannot_take_damage
InternalFunction.Description: prevents an object from taking damage

InternalFunction.Name: object_can_take_damage
InternalFunction.Description: allows an object to take damage again

InternalFunction.Name: object_beautify
InternalFunction.Description: makes an object pretty for the remainder of the levels' cutscenes.

InternalFunction.Name: objects_predict
InternalFunction.Description: loads textures necessary to draw a objects that are about to come on-screen.

InternalFunction.Name: object_type_predict
InternalFunction.Description: loads textures necessary to draw an object that's about to come on-screen.

InternalFunction.Name: effect_new
InternalFunction.Description: starts the specified effect at the specified flag.

InternalFunction.Name: effect_new_on_object_marker
InternalFunction.Description: starts the specified effect on the specified object at the specified marker.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_set_gain
InternalFunction.Description: absolutely do not use this

InternalFunction.Name: sound_get_gain
InternalFunction.Description: absolutely do not use this either

InternalFunction.Name: sound_set_supplementary_buffers
InternalFunction.Description: Set the amount of supplementary buffers

InternalFunction.Name: sound_impulse_predict
InternalFunction.Description: loads an impulse sound into the sound cache ready for playback.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_impulse_start
InternalFunction.Description: plays an impulse sound from the specified source object (or "none"), with the specified scale.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_impulse_time
InternalFunction.Description: returns the time remaining for the specified impulse sound.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_impulse_stop
InternalFunction.Description: stops the specified impulse sound.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_looping_predict
InternalFunction.Description: your mom.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_looping_start
InternalFunction.Description: plays a looping sound from the specified source object (or "none"), with the specified scale.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_looping_stop
InternalFunction.Description: stops the specified looping sound.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_looping_set_scale
InternalFunction.Description: changes the scale of the sound (which should affect the volume) within the range 0 to 1.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_looping_set_alternate
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables the alternate loop/alternate end for a looping sound.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_sounds_enable
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disabled all sound classes matching the substring.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_sounds_distances
InternalFunction.Description: changes the minimum and maximum distances for all sound classes matching the substring.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_sounds_wet
InternalFunction.Description: changes the reverb level for all sound classes matching the substring.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_cache_flush
InternalFunction.Description: i'm a rebel!

InternalFunction.Name: sound_cache_dump_to_file
InternalFunction.Description: dump dat shit!

InternalFunction.Name: sound_enable
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables all sound.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_class_set_gain
InternalFunction.Description: changes the gain on the specified sound class(es) to the specified game over the specified number of ticks.

InternalFunction.Name: sound_enable_eax
InternalFunction.Description: Enable or disable EAX extensions

InternalFunction.Name: sound_eax_enabled
InternalFunction.Description: Returns true if EAX extensions are enabled

InternalFunction.Name: sound_enable_hardware
InternalFunction.Description: Enable or disable hardware sound buffers

Global.Name: SupplementaryBuffers
Global.Description: Get the amount of supplementary buffers

InternalFunction.Name: time_code_show
InternalFunction.Description: shows the time code timer

InternalFunction.Name: time_code_start
InternalFunction.Description: starts/stops the time code timer

InternalFunction.Name: time_code_reset
InternalFunction.Description: resets the time code timer

InternalFunction.Name: numeric_countdown_timer_set
InternalFunction.Description: <milliseconds>, <auto_start>

InternalFunction.Name: numeric_countdown_timer_get
InternalFunction.Description: <digit_index>

InternalFunction.Name: recording_play
InternalFunction.Description: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording.

InternalFunction.Name: recording_play_and_delete
InternalFunction.Description: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording, deletes the unit when the animation finishes.

InternalFunction.Name: recording_play_and_hover
InternalFunction.Description: make the specified vehicle run the specified cutscene recording, hovers the vehicle when the animation finishes.

InternalFunction.Name: recording_kill
InternalFunction.Description: kill the specified unit's cutscene recording.

InternalFunction.Name: recording_time
InternalFunction.Description: return the time remaining in the specified unit's cutscene recording.

InternalFunction.Name: render_lights
InternalFunction.Description: enables/disables dynamic lights

InternalFunction.Name: rasterizer_reload_effects
InternalFunction.Description: check for shader changes

InternalFunction.Name: rasterizer_fixed_function_ambient
InternalFunction.Description: set the ambient light value for fixed function

InternalFunction.Name: rasterizer_decals_flush
InternalFunction.Description: flush all decals

InternalFunction.Name: rasterizer_fps_accumulate
InternalFunction.Description: average fps

InternalFunction.Name: texture_cache_flush
InternalFunction.Description: don't make me kick your ass

InternalFunction.Name: scenery_get_animation_time
InternalFunction.Description: returns the number of ticks remaining in a custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

InternalFunction.Name: scenery_animation_start
InternalFunction.Description: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery

InternalFunction.Name: scenery_animation_start_at_frame
InternalFunction.Description: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery at a specific frame

InternalFunction.Name: unit_can_blink
InternalFunction.Description: allows a unit to blink or not (units never blink when they are dead)

InternalFunction.Name: unit_open
InternalFunction.Description: opens the hatches on the given unit

InternalFunction.Name: unit_close
InternalFunction.Description: closes the hatches on a given unit

InternalFunction.Name: unit_kill
InternalFunction.Description: kills a given unit, no saving throw

InternalFunction.Name: unit_kill_silent
InternalFunction.Description: kills a given unit silently (doesn't make them play their normal death animation or sound)

InternalFunction.Name: unit_get_custom_animation_time
InternalFunction.Description: returns the number of ticks remaining in a unit's custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

InternalFunction.Name: unit_stop_custom_animation
InternalFunction.Description: stops the custom animation running on the given unit.

InternalFunction.Name: unit_custom_animation_at_frame
InternalFunction.Description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit at a specific frame index(interpolates into animation if next to last parameter is TRUE)

InternalFunction.Name: unit_is_playing_custom_animation
InternalFunction.Description: returns TRUE if the given unit is still playing a custom animation

InternalFunction.Name: unit_aim_without_turning
InternalFunction.Description: allows a unit to aim in place without turning

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_emotion
InternalFunction.Description: sets a unit's facial expression (-1 is none, other values depend on unit)

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_enterable_by_player
InternalFunction.Description: can be used to prevent the player from entering a vehicle

InternalFunction.Name: unit_enter_vehicle
InternalFunction.Description: puts the specified unit in the specified vehicle (in the named seat)

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_emotion_animation
InternalFunction.Description: sets the emotion animation to be used for the given unit

InternalFunction.Name: unit_exit_vehicle
InternalFunction.Description: makes a unit exit its vehicle

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_maximum_vitality
InternalFunction.Description: sets a unit's maximum body and shield vitality

InternalFunction.Name: units_set_maximum_vitality
InternalFunction.Description: sets a group of units' maximum body and shield vitality

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_current_vitality
InternalFunction.Description: sets a unit's current body and shield vitality

InternalFunction.Name: units_set_current_vitality
InternalFunction.Description: sets a group of units' current body and shield vitality

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_seat
InternalFunction.Description: this unit will assume the named seat

InternalFunction.Name: unit_get_health
InternalFunction.Description: returns the health [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

InternalFunction.Name: unit_get_shield
InternalFunction.Description: returns the shield [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

InternalFunction.Name: unit_get_total_grenade_count
InternalFunction.Description: returns the total number of grenades for the given unit, 0 if it does not exist

InternalFunction.Name: unit_has_weapon
InternalFunction.Description: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as a weapon, FALSE otherwise

InternalFunction.Name: unit_has_weapon_readied
InternalFunction.Description: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as the primary weapon, FALSE otherwise

InternalFunction.Name: unit_doesnt_drop_items
InternalFunction.Description: prevents any of the given units from dropping weapons or grenades when they die

InternalFunction.Name: unit_impervious
InternalFunction.Description: prevents any of the given units from being knocked around or playing ping animations

InternalFunction.Name: unit_suspended
InternalFunction.Description: stops gravity from working on the given unit

InternalFunction.Name: unit_solo_player_integrated_night_vision_is_active
InternalFunction.Description: returns whether the night-vision mode could be activated via the flashlight button

InternalFunction.Name: units_set_desired_flashlight_state
InternalFunction.Description: sets the units' desired flashlight state

InternalFunction.Name: unit_set_desired_flashlight_state
InternalFunction.Description: sets the unit's desired flashlight state

InternalFunction.Name: unit_get_current_flashlight_state
InternalFunction.Description: gets the unit's current flashlight state

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_test_seat_list
InternalFunction.Description: tests whether the named seat has an object in the object list

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_test_seat
InternalFunction.Description: tests whether the named seat has a specified unit in it

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_load_magic
InternalFunction.Description: makes a list of units (named or by encounter) magically get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_unload
InternalFunction.Description: makes units get out of a vehicle from the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_riders
InternalFunction.Description: returns a list of all riders in a vehicle

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_driver
InternalFunction.Description: returns the driver of a vehicle

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_gunner
InternalFunction.Description: returns the gunner of a vehicle

InternalFunction.Name: vehicle_hover
InternalFunction.Description: stops the vehicle from running real physics and runs fake hovering physics instead.

InternalFunction.Name: device_group_get
InternalFunction.Description: returns the desired value of the specified device group.

InternalFunction.Name: device_group_set
InternalFunction.Description: changes the desired value of the specified device group.

InternalFunction.Name: device_group_set_immediate
InternalFunction.Description: instantaneously changes the value of the specified device group.

InternalFunction.Name: device_group_change_only_once_more_set
InternalFunction.Description: TRUE allows a device to change states only once

InternalFunction.Name: device_set_never_appears_locked
InternalFunction.Description: changes a machine's never_appears_locked flag, but only if paul is a bastard

InternalFunction.Name: device_get_power
InternalFunction.Description: gets the current power of a named device

InternalFunction.Name: device_set_power
InternalFunction.Description: immediately sets the power of a named device to the given value

InternalFunction.Name: device_set_position
InternalFunction.Description: set the desired position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

InternalFunction.Name: device_get_position
InternalFunction.Description: gets the current position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

InternalFunction.Name: device_set_position_immediate
InternalFunction.Description: instantaneously changes the position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups

InternalFunction.Name: device_one_sided_set
InternalFunction.Description: TRUE makes the given device one-sided (only able to be opened from one direction), FALSE makes it two-sided

InternalFunction.Name: device_operates_automatically_set
InternalFunction.Description: TRUE makes the given device open automatically when any biped is nearby, FALSE makes it not

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_all_powerups
InternalFunction.Description: drops all powerups near player

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_all_weapons
InternalFunction.Description: drops all weapons near player

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_spawn_warthog
InternalFunction.Description: drops a warthog near player

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_all_vehicles
InternalFunction.Description: drops all vehicles on player

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_teleport_to_camera
InternalFunction.Description: teleports player to camera location

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_active_camouflage
InternalFunction.Description: gives the player active camouflage

InternalFunction.Name: cheat_active_camouflage_local_player
InternalFunction.Description: gives the player active camouflage

InternalFunction.Name: cheats_load
InternalFunction.Description: reloads the cheats.txt file

InternalFunction.Name: debug_camera_load
InternalFunction.Description: loads the saved camera position and facing.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_camera_save
InternalFunction.Description: saves the camera position and facing.

InternalFunction.Name: camera_control
InternalFunction.Description: toggles script control of the camera.

InternalFunction.Name: camera_set
InternalFunction.Description: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks.

InternalFunction.Name: camera_set_relative
InternalFunction.Description: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks (position is relative to the specified object).

InternalFunction.Name: camera_set_animation
InternalFunction.Description: begins a prerecorded camera animation.

InternalFunction.Name: camera_time
InternalFunction.Description: returns the number of ticks remaining in the current camera interpolation.

Global.Name: FirstPerson
Global.Description: makes the scripted camera follow a unit.

Global.Name: Dead
Global.Description: makes the scripted camera zoom out around a unit as if it were dead.

Global.Name: Real
Global.Description: returns the actual current difficulty setting without lying

InternalFunction.Name: game_save_cancel
InternalFunction.Description: cancels any pending game_save, timeout or not

InternalFunction.Name: game_save_no_timeout
InternalFunction.Description: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (this version never gives up)

InternalFunction.Name: game_save_totally_unsafe
InternalFunction.Description: disregards player's current situation

InternalFunction.Name: game_speed
InternalFunction.Description: changes the game speed.

InternalFunction.Name: game_time
InternalFunction.Description: gets ticks elapsed since the start of the game.

InternalFunction.Name: game_variant
InternalFunction.Description: set the game engine

InternalFunction.Name: game_won
InternalFunction.Description: causes the player to successfully finish the current level and move to the next

InternalFunction.Name: game_lost
InternalFunction.Description: causes the player to revert to his previous saved game

InternalFunction.Name: game_safe_to_save
InternalFunction.Description: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

InternalFunction.Name: game_all_quiet
InternalFunction.Description: returns FALSE if there are bad guys around, projectiles in the air, etc.

InternalFunction.Name: game_safe_to_speak
InternalFunction.Description: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

InternalFunction.Name: game_is_cooperative
InternalFunction.Description: returns TRUE if the game is cooperative

InternalFunction.Name: game_save
InternalFunction.Description: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (gives up after 8 seconds)

InternalFunction.Name: game_saving
InternalFunction.Description: checks to see if the game is trying to save the map.

InternalFunction.Name: game_revert
InternalFunction.Description: reverts to last saved game, if any (for testing, the first bastard that does this to me gets it in the head)

InternalFunction.Name: game_reverted
InternalFunction.Description: don't use this for anything, you black-hearted bastards.

InternalFunction.Name: game_skip_ticks
InternalFunction.Description: skips <short> amount of game ticks. ONLY USE IN CUTSCENES!!!

Global.Name: Difficulty
Global.Description: returns the current difficulty setting, but lies to you and will never return easy, instead returning normal

SetAccessor.Name: game_difficulty_set
SetAccessor.Description: changes the difficulty setting for the next map to be loaded.

InternalFunction.Name: profile_service_clear_timers
InternalFunction.Description: clears the timers that are present in the profiling service

InternalFunction.Name: profile_service_dump_timers
InternalFunction.Description: dumps the profiling service timers

InternalFunction.Name: profile_reset
InternalFunction.Description: resets profiling data.

InternalFunction.Name: profile_dump
InternalFunction.Description: dumps profile based on a substring.

InternalFunction.Name: profile_activate
InternalFunction.Description: activates profile sections based on a substring.

InternalFunction.Name: profile_deactivate
InternalFunction.Description: deactivates profile sections based on a substring.

InternalFunction.Name: profile_graph_toggle
InternalFunction.Description: enables or disables profile graph display of a particular value.

InternalFunction.Name: profile_unlock_solo_levels
InternalFunction.Description: unlocks all the solo player levels for player 1's profile

InternalFunction.Name: profile_load
InternalFunction.Description: Load any included builtin profiles and create profiles on disk.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_memory_by_file
InternalFunction.Description: dumps memory leaks by source file.

InternalFunction.Name: debug_memory_for_file
InternalFunction.Description: dumps memory leaks from the specified source file.

InternalFunction.Name: fade_in
InternalFunction.Description: does a screen fade in from a particular color

InternalFunction.Name: fade_out
InternalFunction.Description: does a screen fade out to a particular color

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_start
InternalFunction.Description: initializes game to start a cinematic (interruptive) cutscene

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_stop
InternalFunction.Description: initializes the game to end a cinematic (interruptive) cutscene

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_abort
InternalFunction.Description: aborts a cinematic

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_show_letterbox
InternalFunction.Description: sets or removes the letterbox bars

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_set_title_delayed
InternalFunction.Description: activates the chapter title, delayed by <real> seconds

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_suppress_bsp_object_creation
InternalFunction.Description: suppresses or enables the automatic creation of objects during cutscenes due to a bsp switch

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_screen_effect_start
InternalFunction.Description: starts screen effect; pass TRUE to clear

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_convolution
InternalFunction.Description: sets the convolution effect

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_filter
InternalFunction.Description: sets the filter effect

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_filter_desaturation_tint
InternalFunction.Description: sets the desaturation filter tint color

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_video
InternalFunction.Description: sets the video effect: <noise intensity[0,1]>, <overbright: 0=none, 1=2x, 2=4x>

InternalFunction.Name: cinematic_screen_effect_stop
InternalFunction.Description: returns control of the screen effects to the rest of the game

InternalFunction.Name: core_save
InternalFunction.Description: saves debug game state to core\core.bin

InternalFunction.Name: core_save_name
InternalFunction.Description: saves debug game state to core\<path>

InternalFunction.Name: core_load
InternalFunction.Description: loads debug game state from core\core.bin

InternalFunction.Name: core_load_at_startup
InternalFunction.Description: loads debug game state from core\core.bin as soon as the map is initialized

InternalFunction.Name: core_load_name
InternalFunction.Description: loads debug game state from core\<path>

InternalFunction.Name: core_load_name_at_startup
InternalFunction.Description: loads debug game state from core\<path> as soon as the map is initialized

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_reset
InternalFunction.Description: resets the player action test state so that all tests will return false.

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_jump
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has jumped since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_primary_trigger
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has used primary trigger since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_grenade_trigger
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has used grenade trigger since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_zoom
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has hit the zoom button since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_action
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has hit the action key since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_accept
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has hit accept since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_back
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has hit the back key since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_look_relative_up
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has looked up since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_look_relative_down
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has looked down since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_look_relative_left
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has looked left since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_look_relative_right
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has looked right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_look_relative_all_directions
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has looked up, down, left, and right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: player_action_test_move_relative_all_directions
InternalFunction.Description: returns true if any player has moved forward, backward, left, and right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

InternalFunction.Name: show_player_update_stats
InternalFunction.Description: Shows update history playback stats.

InternalFunction.Name: player_effect_set_max_rotation
InternalFunction.Description: <yaw> <pitch> <roll>

InternalFunction.Name: player_effect_set_max_vibrate
InternalFunction.Description: <left> <right>

InternalFunction.Name: player_effect_start
InternalFunction.Description: <max_intensity> <attack time>

InternalFunction.Name: player_effect_stop
InternalFunction.Description: <decay>

InternalFunction.Name: players_unzoom_all
InternalFunction.Description: resets zoom levels on all players

InternalFunction.Name: player_enable_input
InternalFunction.Description: toggle player input. the player can still free-look, but nothing else.

InternalFunction.Name: player_camera_control
InternalFunction.Description: enables/disables camera control globally

InternalFunction.Name: player_add_equipment
InternalFunction.Description: adds/resets the player's health, shield, and inventory (weapons and grenades) to the named profile. resets if third parameter is true, adds if false.

InternalFunction.Name: show_hud_help_text
InternalFunction.Description: shows or hides the hud help text

InternalFunction.Name: hud_show_health
InternalFunction.Description: hides/shows the health panel

InternalFunction.Name: hud_show_shield
InternalFunction.Description: hides/shows the shield panel

InternalFunction.Name: hud_show_motion_sensor
InternalFunction.Description: hides/shows the motion sensor panel

InternalFunction.Name: hud_show_crosshair
InternalFunction.Description: hides/shows the weapon crosshair

InternalFunction.Name: show_hud_timer
InternalFunction.Description: displays the hud timer

InternalFunction.Name: hud_blink_health
InternalFunction.Description: starts/stops manual blinking of the health panel

InternalFunction.Name: hud_blink_shield
InternalFunction.Description: starts/stops manual blinking of the shield panel

InternalFunction.Name: hud_blink_motion_sensor
InternalFunction.Description: starts/stops manual blinking of the motion sensor panel

InternalFunction.Name: hud_set_timer_time
InternalFunction.Description: sets the time for the timer to <short> minutes and <short> seconds, and starts and displays timer

InternalFunction.Name: hud_set_timer_warning_time
InternalFunction.Description: sets the warning time for the timer to <short> minutes and <short> seconds

InternalFunction.Name: hud_set_timer_position
InternalFunction.Description: sets the timer upper left position to (x, y)=>(<short>, <short>)

InternalFunction.Name: hud_help_flash_restart
InternalFunction.Description: resets the timer for the help text flashing

InternalFunction.Name: hud_team_icon_set_pos
InternalFunction.Description: shit

InternalFunction.Name: hud_team_icon_set_scale
InternalFunction.Description: shit

InternalFunction.Name: hud_team_background_set_pos
InternalFunction.Description: shit

InternalFunction.Name: hud_team_background_set_scale
InternalFunction.Description: shit

InternalFunction.Name: hud_clear_messages
InternalFunction.Description: clears all non-state messages on the hud

Global.Name: TimerTicks
Global.Description: returns the ticks left on the hud timer

InternalFunction.Name: activate_nav_point_flag
InternalFunction.Description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to (local) player <unit> anchored to a flag with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

InternalFunction.Name: activate_nav_point_object
InternalFunction.Description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to (local) player <unit> anchored to an object with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

InternalFunction.Name: activate_team_nav_point_flag
InternalFunction.Description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to a team anchored to a flag with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

InternalFunction.Name: activate_team_nav_point_object
InternalFunction.Description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to a team anchored to an object with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

InternalFunction.Name: deactivate_nav_point_flag
InternalFunction.Description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a player <unit> anchored to a flag

InternalFunction.Name: deactivate_nav_point_object
InternalFunction.Description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a player <unit> anchored to an object

InternalFunction.Name: deactivate_team_nav_point_flag
InternalFunction.Description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a team anchored to a flag

InternalFunction.Name: deactivate_team_nav_point_object
InternalFunction.Description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a team anchored to an object

InternalFunction.Name: message_metrics_clear
InternalFunction.Description: clears network messaging metrics

InternalFunction.Name: message_metrics_dump
InternalFunction.Description: dumps network messaging metrics to given file ("" for default)

InternalFunction.Name: hammer_begin
InternalFunction.Description: hammers the server by connecting and disconnecting repeatedly.

InternalFunction.Name: hammer_stop
InternalFunction.Description: stops hammering the server.

InternalFunction.Name: network_server_dump
InternalFunction.Description: Dumps info on network server.

InternalFunction.Name: network_client_dump
InternalFunction.Description: Dumps info on network client.

InternalFunction.Name: net_graph_clear
InternalFunction.Description: Clears the net_graph.

InternalFunction.Name: net_graph_show
InternalFunction.Description: Changes the net_graph display (bytes/packets, sent/received)

InternalFunction.Name: player0_look_invert_pitch
InternalFunction.Description: invert player0's look

InternalFunction.Name: player0_look_pitch_is_inverted
InternalFunction.Description: returns TRUE if player0's look pitch is inverted

InternalFunction.Name: player0_joystick_set_is_normal
InternalFunction.Description: returns TRUE if player0 is using the normal joystick set

InternalFunction.Name: get_digital_forward_throttle
InternalFunction.Description: gets the amount of forward throttle applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: set_digital_forward_throttle
InternalFunction.Description: sets the amount of forward throttle applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: get_digital_strafe_throttle
InternalFunction.Description: gets the amount of strafe throttle applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: set_digital_strafe_throttle
InternalFunction.Description: sets the amount of strafe throttle applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: get_digital_yaw_increment
InternalFunction.Description: gets the increment in yaw applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: set_digital_yaw_increment
InternalFunction.Description: sets the increment in yaw applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: get_digital_pitch_increment
InternalFunction.Description: gets the increment in pitch applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: set_digital_pitch_increment
InternalFunction.Description: sets the increment in pitch applied by digital device stimuli

InternalFunction.Name: get_mouse_forward_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: gets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full forward throttle

InternalFunction.Name: set_mouse_forward_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: sets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full forward throttle

InternalFunction.Name: get_mouse_strafe_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: gets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full strafe throttle

InternalFunction.Name: set_mouse_strafe_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: sets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full strafe throttle

InternalFunction.Name: get_mouse_yaw_scale
InternalFunction.Description: gets the scale for mouse control of yaw

InternalFunction.Name: set_mouse_yaw_scale
InternalFunction.Description: sets the scale for mouse control of yaw

InternalFunction.Name: get_mouse_pitch_scale
InternalFunction.Description: gets the scale for mouse control of pitch

InternalFunction.Name: set_mouse_pitch_scale
InternalFunction.Description: sets the scale for mouse control of pitch

InternalFunction.Name: get_gamepad_forward_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: gets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full forward throttle

InternalFunction.Name: set_gamepad_forward_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: sets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full forward throttle

InternalFunction.Name: get_gamepad_strafe_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: gets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full strafe throttle

InternalFunction.Name: set_gamepad_strafe_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: sets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full strafe throttle

InternalFunction.Name: get_gamepad_yaw_scale
InternalFunction.Description: gets the scale for gamepad control of yaw

InternalFunction.Name: set_gamepad_yaw_scale
InternalFunction.Description: sets the scale for gamepad control of yaw

InternalFunction.Name: get_gamepad_pitch_scale
InternalFunction.Description: gets the scale for gamepad control of pitch

InternalFunction.Name: set_gamepad_pitch_scale
InternalFunction.Description: sets the scale for gamepad control of pitch

InternalFunction.Name: input_is_joy_active
InternalFunction.Description: test function to determine if an enumerated joystick is activated or not

InternalFunction.Name: input_activate_joy
InternalFunction.Description: activates an enumerated joystick into a logical joystick slot

InternalFunction.Name: input_deactivate_joy
InternalFunction.Description: deactivates an enumerated joystick, freeing up the logical joystick slot

InternalFunction.Name: input_find_joystick
InternalFunction.Description: test function to find a joystick by GUID (string representation)

InternalFunction.Name: input_show_joystick_info
InternalFunction.Description: test function to show the enumerated joystick information for all joystick

InternalFunction.Name: input_find_default
InternalFunction.Description: test function that looks up a default profile for a deviceid

Global.Name: JoyCount
Global.Description: test function to return the number of joysticks enumerated

InternalFunction.Name: sv_mapcycle_begin
InternalFunction.Description: Restart or begin playing the currently loaded mapcycle file

InternalFunction.Name: sv_mapcycle_add
InternalFunction.Description: Usage: sv_mapcycle_add <mapname> <variantname> Add a new game to the end of the mapcycle file.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_mapcycle_del
InternalFunction.Description: Usage: sv_mapcycle_del <index> Removes the game at <index>. Will not affect running games.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_map_next
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Abort the current game and begin the next game in the playlist

InternalFunction.Name: sv_map_reset
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Reset the current game

InternalFunction.Name: sv_log_note
InternalFunction.Description: Leave a note in the server log

InternalFunction.Name: sv_log_file
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the server log file name. If no name is given, displays the current log file name.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_log_enabled
InternalFunction.Description: Enables or disables server logging. If 0/1 is not given, displays the current logging status.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_log_rotation_threshold
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the log rotation threshold. When a log file's size (in kilobytes) exceeds this number, it will be rotated. Set to 0 to disable log rotation. If the threshold is not specified, displays the current threshold.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_log_echo_chat
InternalFunction.Description: Enables or disbles chat echo to the console. Set the preference to 0 to disable chat echo, or 1 to enable chat echo. If the preference is not specified, displays the current preference.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_tk_grace
InternalFunction.Description: Specify the grace period for TK during which you don't get a TK point.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_tk_cooldown
InternalFunction.Description: Specify a TK point cooldown period, after which players lose a TK point.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_end_game
InternalFunction.Description: End the current game.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_mapcycle
InternalFunction.Description: Print the contents of the currently loaded mapcycle file

InternalFunction.Name: sv_map
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Usage: "sv_map <mapname> <variantname>" Abort current game and playlist and start specified game

InternalFunction.Name: sv_rcon_password
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the server remote console password. If no password is given, displays the current password. Enter "" to disable rcon.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_say
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Usage: "sv_say <message>" Send a message to users

InternalFunction.Name: sv_players
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Print a list of players in the current game

InternalFunction.Name: sv_kick
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Usage: sv_kick <player # or name> Kicks the specified player from the server

InternalFunction.Name: sv_ban
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Player is kicked and added to banned.txt. Use sv_players to find the index. Specify optional duration for timed ban. Use 0 to follow sv_ban_penalty rules.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_banlist
InternalFunction.Description: Print a list of banned players

InternalFunction.Name: sv_unban
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Usage: sv_unban <index> Removes player at index in the banlist. Use sv_banlist to find the index

InternalFunction.Name: sv_parameters_reload
InternalFunction.Description: <Server Only> Usage: sv_parameters_reload Reloads the parameters.cfg file.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_parameters_dump
InternalFunction.Description: Dumps out the local parameter configuration to parameters.cfg file.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_status
InternalFunction.Description: Shows status of the server

InternalFunction.Name: sv_name
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the name of the server. If no name is given, displays the current name.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_password
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the server password. If no password is given, displays the current password.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_get_player_action_queue_length
InternalFunction.Description: Displays the action queue length for the specified player.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_maplist
InternalFunction.Description: Display a list of maps, matching an optional substring.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_gamelist
InternalFunction.Description: Display a list of game types, matching an optional substring.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_friendly_fire
InternalFunction.Description: Use to provide a global override for the gametype friendly fire setting.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_timelimit
InternalFunction.Description: Use to provide a global override for the gametype timelimit setting.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_ban_penalty
InternalFunction.Description: Specify up to 4 ban times for repeat ban/TK offenders.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_banlist_file
InternalFunction.Description: Sets and opens the file to be used for the player ban list.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_maxplayers
InternalFunction.Description: Sets the maximum number of players (between 1 and 16). If no value is given, displays the current value.

InternalFunction.Name: sv_single_flag_force_reset
InternalFunction.Description: Force the flag to reset in single flag CTF games when the timer expires, even if held by a player. If not specified, displays the current value.

InternalFunction.Name: checkpoint_save
InternalFunction.Description: save last solo checkpoint

InternalFunction.Name: checkpoint_load
InternalFunction.Description: load a saved checkpoint
